code: import axios from'axios';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import API_BASE_URL from'../config.js';const useEventService=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const getEvents=async()=>{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/events/"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};const getEventGames=async id_event=>{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/games/").concat(id_event,"/"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};return{getEvents,getEventGames};};export default useEventService;
